description: HTML file containing embedded JavaScript defining a 'Calculator' class extending 'Service', with methods 'add' and 'sub', and code to initialize and register the service via ServiceManager.

classes.name: Calculator
classes.description: A class extending Service that provides 'add' and 'sub' methods.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds two or more parameters and returns the sum asynchronously.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Subtracts second parameter from first and returns the difference asynchronously.
